title: Vibrato Challenge
description: Improve the quality of your vibrato.
conditions_for_success: Normal vibrato practice x3 for duration of quest.

title: Schindler's List Violin
description: Learn the theme for Schindler's List.
conditions_for_success: List to theme for Schindler's List x20.
Divide the piece into several parts for individual practice.
Practice each part x3, then the whole piece x3, 3 times/wk.
